= Requirements =

== Server Requirements ==

 * A PHP-compliant webserver (tested with Apache/2.2.11)
 * PHP 5.0.0 or higher (tested with PHP/5.2.6-3ubuntu4.2) with cURL support

== Client Requirements ==

 * Any modern browser (tested with Firefox 3.5 and Internet Explorer 8)
